channel.title: Current Events: Summer of 2007
channel.description:
[ul]I just need some things that I couldn't find. I just need a brief description for these. If you know even just one, please post it here. Thanks.
[list] [li]Congress response to US relationship with Iraq[/li] [li]Leaders emerge from a packed field as primaries approach (note: This is asking for who's going to be the candidate for each party. If you know, post here.)[/li] [li]Electronic surveillance[/li] [li][s]Credit, mortgage, stock market issues[/s][/li] [li][s]Imports from China[/li][/list][/s] [list][li]Political instability and terrorist issue in Pakistan[/li] [li]Immigration debate continues[/li] [li][s]"George decides he wants the Scooter out and about"[/s][/li] [li]Waiting on line for fancy phones (note: I think this might have something to do with the iPhone)[/li] [/list]
That's it, if you know someting, please post. I'll be crossing these off as I get them. Remember that all of this are events which happened over the summer this year. Thanks.[/ul]

item.title: Current Events: Summer of 2007

@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Thanks, Bobby.

Casey, it asks about the US.

item.title: Current Events: Summer of 2007

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

imports from china was about how we were getting toys with lead and poisened fod from them.

c m s issues was about aobut how the sub prime ( poeple who had bad credit but still got a loan) loan market was crashing since lots of poeple were defualting( unable to pay) there loans

there’s 2

sex plz
